summary: This mod improves vampirism in various ways.  It essentially reverses vampirism making you grow weaker if you don\'t feed.  The mod itself is balanced around master difficulty.
descriptionHtml:
*****************************************************************

	                TES: Skyrim
	       LFox Vampire Improvements v1.0
			 Made by LFox

*****************************************************************

     1. INSTALLING THE PLUGIN

*****************************************************************

1. Extract the mod to the Data folder and enable it via the
launcher or mod manager.

*****************************************************************

     2. Mod Load Order

*****************************************************************

This plugin should be fine anywhere in your load order.  It will
be incompatible with anything that modifies vampire abilities.

If your using my mod LFox No Vampire Cooldown.esp disable
and remove it.  The cooldown change is already incorperated
into this mod.

*****************************************************************

     3. Mod Description

*****************************************************************

This is my own personal vampire improvement mod.  I will not be
making it modular and it is balanced around master difficulty.
If you do not play on master difficulty or want to be able to
pick and choose changes then i\'m sorry this mod is not for you.

This mod aims to improve vampires in almost every aspect.  I
wouldn\'t call it lore friendly since it essentially makes
vampirism backwards.  Feeding makes you stronger and you grow
weaker when you don\'t feed.

NOTE: Abilities on NPCs are currently unchanged.

IMPORTANT: If you\'re currently playing a vampire you\'ll probably
need to cure and reinfect yourself or switch between vampire
stages for the mod to properly take effect.

Author\'s Ramblings
******************
Currently the mod is completely playable but incomplete since
several features require more hands on than skyedit allows.
I\'ll be honest i don\'t know how long i\'ll be supporting this
mod and updating it.  I don\'t play vampires even half as often
as i do werewolves which is not very ideal when your working on
a mod like this.

I may discontinue the mod if someone releases a vampire mod that
pleases me.  Until then i\'ll be updating my own personal version.
I hadn\'t really planned on releasing this mod but since i was
asked i decided to put it up for others to use if they like.

Missing features requiring the CK
- Shifting Stage 3, 4 spells to stages 1, 2
- Sun Damage on Stage 3, 4 vampirism.  (Current attempts lock
out waiting, fast traveling ect)
- Bottling Blood

Vampire Feeding
***************
Vampire feeding has been enabled on dead animals as well as
dead npcs.  It has been modified to only be enabled while
sneaking to prevent menu popups when you would otherwise just
be looting.

NOTE: All other forms of feeding except the default sleeping
npcs has no animation.

Vampire Strength
****************
Weakness to Sunlight is as follows.

Level 1 - No regeneration in the sun but increased regeneration
out of it, No Sun Damage, No HP/MP/STAM Damage

Level 2 - No regeneration in the sun but increased regeneration
out of it, No Sun Damage, 30 HP/MP/STAM Damage

Level 3 - No regeneration, (sun damage not implimented),
45 HP/MP/STAM Damage

Level 4 - No regeneration, (sun damage not implimented),
60 HP/MP/STAM Damage

NOTE: I was unable to include the Sovngarde condition with
SkyEdit for various conditions.  So it won\'t function correctly in
Sovngarde.

Vampiric Strength is as follows.

Level 1 - +40 Unarmed Damage
Level 2 - +30 Unarmed Damage
Level 3 - +20 Unarmed Damage
Level 4 - +10 Unarmed Damage

Resist Frost/Weakness to Fire is as follows.

Level 1 - 100% Resist Frost and 50% Weakness to Fire
Level 2 - 75% Resist Frost and 50% Weakness to Fire
Level 3 - 50% Resist Frost and 75% Weakness to Fire
Level 4 - 25% Resist Frost and 100% Weakness to Fire

Vampire Powers
**************
Vampire Sight
- Lasts 99999 seconds.

Vampire Seduction
- No Cooldown
- Now does up to level 25

Embrace Of Shadows
- No Cooldown

Vampire Drain
- No Cost
- Power Reversed (stage 1 is strongest, stage 4 weakest)
- Drain increased by x4

Vampire\'s Servant
- Power Reversed (stage 1 is strongest, stage 4 weakest)
- No Cooldown

*****************************************************************

     4. Version History

*****************************************************************

v1.0
- Made the Plugin.
